summary: This document appears to be notes prepared for trial testimony, dated November 5, 2021, containing previously undisclosed or clarifying recollections. It references a witness's memories of interactions with Jeffrey Epstein (JE) and Ghislaine Maxwell (GM), including a trip to New Mexico (NM), financial associations, and the witness's feelings of obligation and subsequent expectations of further contact.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as JE, described as the boss who was interested in supporting the witness's education, leading to a trip to New Mexico.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to as GM; the witness sensed after the New Mexico trip that she would have further contact with both JE and GM based on their manner of speaking.

connections.description: Both are mentioned together in the context of the witness sensing future contact with them after a trip to New Mexico.
JE is referred to as the boss, and the witness felt obligated to go to New Mexico because he was the boss and had shown interest in supporting her education.

events.title: Trip to New Mexico
events.description: A trip to New Mexico (NM) taken by the witness with Jeffrey Epstein. The witness felt obligated to go because Epstein was her boss and had shown interest in supporting her education. She expressed excitement and gratitude during the trip.

events.title: Preparation of Testimony Notes
events.description: Notes were prepared on November 5, 2021, for trial testimony, containing previously undisclosed, clarifying, or different recollections and information.

locations: NM property (mentioned as looking different in later news coverage)
keyFacts: The document is prepared testimony notes containing previously undisclosed or clarifying recollections, dated November 5, 2021.
It states Jeffrey Epstein (JE) acquired his money in association with a man connected to Victoria's Secret and Limited.
A witness felt obligated to travel to New Mexico with Epstein because he was her boss and had shown interest in supporting her education.
After the New Mexico trip, the witness sensed she would have further contact with both Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell based on their conversations.
The New Mexico property is noted to have looked different in later news coverage.
